title: [Krag Slopes]
description: The fierce wind sends low-lying clouds scudding across the path, almost obscuring the fact that one side of the rock has fallen away and the way forward becomes a narrow ledge.  A long fissure has been gouged in the dark rock, barely visible in the covering darkness.

The fierce wind sends low-lying clouds scudding across the path, almost obscuring the fact that one side of the rock has fallen away and the way forward becomes a narrow ledge.  A long fissure has been gouged in the dark rock, barely visible in the deep shadows that linger there.
